[![](https://i0.wp.com/www.onemanandhisblog.com/content/images/2008/08/2786439063_4e605c41fa.jpg?w=960)](http://www.flickr.com/photos/adders/2786439063/ "photo sharing") [Burnt out London Bus](http://www.flickr.com/photos/adders/2786439063/), originally uploaded by [Adam Tinworth](http://www.flickr.com/people/adders/).
I passed this burning London bus on West Smithfield on the way from one meeting to another this afternoon. The Fire Brigade had sealed off most of the surrounding streets and were busy dousing the last vestiges of the fire. London may annoy me much of the time, but at least itâ€™s never dull.
